column6:
We offer a second floor private bedroom & private bathroom in a modern new construction home in the Wooten neighborhood of North Central Austin. We look forward to welcoming you into our home!

We feature:
- Luxurious sheets and towels, clean bathroom stocked with shampoo/body wash.
- Bottled water on arrival.
- Unlimited street parking in front of the home.
- Easy access to area freeways. The Domain: 10min, Downtown and UT Campus: 15min, Airport: 20min (only in light traffic).
column9: Private Room/Private Bath in a Modern Austin Home
